description: This file defines API routes related to menus in a FastAPI application, including an endpoint to list menu items for a specific restaurant. It imports FastAPI and SQLAlchemy components, sets up a router, and defines an async function to fetch menu items from the database with error handling.

methods.name: list_menu_items(restaurant_id: int, session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_async_session))
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list menu items for a specific restaurant, ensuring the restaurant exists before querying menu items, and returning a list of menu item data.

ctags.name: list_menu_items
ctags.pattern: /^async def list_menu_items(restaurant_id: int, session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_async_session)/
